name: Woodcutter's Cabin
description: A remote fenced-in compound the wilderness.
rumours: I hear ya moving around out there. Git off ma properteh!

1.message: On the ground at your feet is a steel hatch

B.message: You come face-to-face with a grizzled old human. The old man points his rifle at you menacingly...

areas.name: wilderness
areas.message: You are in a rocky wasteland.|The same landscape stretches on for miles.|'Beware of Dogs' reads a poorly-written mounted on the fence.

areas.name: inner compound
areas.message: You are in a fenced-in area.|The sound of dogs barking and a radio playing in the distance warn of a present danger.|You are in enemy territory. Watch out for traps.|You just stepped in dog crap.

areas.name: shack interior
areas.message: A radio is on somewhere, playing unfamiliar and unappealing music.|The walls are lined with shelves of canned food, ammo containers, etc.|There's a musty smell.|This place could use a dusting.

areas.name: fenced in area
areas.message: The shelter is clean, well-lit, and smells like lemon and pine.

areas.name: fallout shelter
areas.message: The shelter is clean, well-lit, and smells like lemon and pine.

name: Campsite
description: The site of a small tent and campfire in the wilderness.
message: The chirping of insects fills the air.|You hear the crackling of a fire nearby.|A gentle breeze rattles the branches of the trees.|You move slowly through the clearing, in spite of the pain.

1.name: campfire
1.message: A wood fire burns in a circle of stones.

2.name: tent
2.message: A structure made of a thin material stretched over a frame of interconnected metal bars. It must be a temporary habitat for these creatures.

4.message: A few steps from where you are, the larger creature faces a tree, the sound of a liquid splashing near his feet. It must be urinating.

areas.name: girlzone
areas.message: You are near the female. She is gazing into the crackling fire, unaware of your presence.|The female's silhouette can be seen in the firelight.

areas.name: guyzone
areas.message: You sense the larger creature is nearby; a foul smell wafts in the air.|You sense a presence nearby.

name: Inn Cellar
message: The cellar is unkempt; you watch your footing so you don't trip on anything.|The air is damp.|There's the sound of dripping in the distance.|Cobwebs brush across your face. Ugh.

areas.name: stench
areas.message: An offensive odor wafts into your nostrils.

1.message: You almost stepped on a dead rat! The thing's massive, the size of a dog at least... and there's huge maggots writhing around inside. Disgusting!

3.message: A rat carcass sandwiched between two ale casks.

4.message: A pile of rat carcasses in various stages of decay. You are glad you didn't eat lunch before coming down here.
